text: Ezɨ Pita uan dafarimɨn me aminivazɨma, me aghumra iti. Ezɨ an Ekiam kalabuziar dɨpenimɨn aven a inigha azenan anetɨzir arazibagh eghari. Egha a kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia bizir kabar gun Jems koma aveghbuaba sara mɨkemegh.” Egha Pita me ategha danganir igharazimɨn ghu.(12:17) Jemsɨn kam a Iesusɨn dozim. Nɨ Galesian 1:19ɨn gan. Jems Jerusalemɨn siosɨn itir gumazir dapanimɨn oto
